updraft.gustup_adv_desc: Form an Updraft by using a gust core near an end crystal.
updraft.gust_core_item_lore_1: Use nearby an end crystal to create an updraft.
updraft.gust_core_item_lore_2: Remove updraft with thrown wind charge.
updraft.parachute_vest_item_lore_1: Fall safely from the greatest of heights!
